summary:
Recently moved to the Netherlands and am able to work remotely effectively. 

Formerly team lead / senior manager in a Singapore food safety agency. I specialized in the implementation and monitoring of food safety regulatory programmes. I have more than 10 years of regulatory experience in various domains of food trade and production, including governance on the use of chemicals and additives in food, as well as on the safe application of pesticides in fresh produce. Internationally oriented and minded, I have a proven ability and track record to establish a professional and mutual working relationship with external stakeholders, such as traders and overseas government bodies.

I love learning new things and meeting people, with a strong focus on building trust and genuine relationships with all. I am also an avid traveler and nature enthusiast, always open to different cultures and expanding my horizon.

[{'company': {'id': None, 'name': None, 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': None, 'description': None, 'title': 'Food Safety Consultant', 'employment_type': 'Freelance'}]}, {'company': {'id': 69074454, 'name': 'Singapore Food Agency', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D560BAQFrnFCZP_Wk9Q/company-logo_400_400/0/1692178777190/sgfoodagency_logo?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=s8Qx_da4tAV2n-iWjN-nA6hX36rrmFd7Lmh7Bx-MjDc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/sgfoodagency/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Singapore, Singapore', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'company': 'Singapore Food Agency', 'description': 'With a deep understanding and knowledge of food safety inspections, food supply chain activities as well as the food trading industry, I progressed to work at the Operations Management division, the centralized team which coordinates and supports the operational and administrative needs of a multi-site department.  
Key achievements:
- In-charged of food recall operations following science-based risk assessments and regulatory evaluations. Nationwide food recalls involving food manufacturers and the food regulatory teams were promptly initiated and coordinated. 
- Participated in the project team to develop dashboards using data-analytic tools for traceability and coordination of food recall operations. 
- Consolidated inspection reports and compiled data received from regional offices accurately, and produced detailed weekly operation reports, presentations, spreadsheets, graphs, charts etc at a tight timeframe for senior management. 
- Coordinated and supported the administrative and operational needs of the new operation department. 
- Prepared, monitored, and reviewed operation resources such as budget and manpower.
- Researched, prepared, and proofread important and complex correspondences.
- Managed Customer Service Platform and ensured incoming inquiries from members of the public and stakeholders were responded to promptly, ensuring resolutions of issues. 
- Coordinated internal and external meetings and provided secretariat support.', 'title': 'Senior Manager (Operation Management)', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 69074454, 'name': 'Singapore Food Agency', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D560BAQFrnFCZP_Wk9Q/company-logo_400_400/0/1692178777190/sgfoodagency_logo?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=s8Qx_da4tAV2n-iWjN-nA6hX36rrmFd7Lmh7Bx-MjDc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/sgfoodagency/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2005}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Singapore', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Singapore Food Agency', 'description': None, 'title': 'Senior Manager (Operations Management)', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Singapore', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Singapore Food Agency', 'description': 'I managed a team of 12 members to implement and carry out food safety inspection operations on imported food products. I was also responsible to maintain strong communication and cooperation with industry stakeholders, balancing food security and safety compliance.

Key achievements:

- Assisted the Deputy Director of Import Inspection division to ensure a high level of professionalism and excellent customer service delivery of food safety inspection operations. 
- Planned, executed, and monitored food safety regulatory and inspection programmes on imported food, including fresh fruit and vegetable, processed food, dairy products and food packaging material. 
- Participated in the development and implementation of a new in-house inspection and monitoring system using mobile devices. The new electronic system was implemented successfully, supporting an annual turnover of at least 40,000 food safety inspections conducted on imported food. 
- Prepared, monitored, and reviewed operation resources such as budget and manpower.
- Maintained the inspection database systematically to generate quick and reliable statistical reports as and when required.
- Participated in business process re-engineering (BPR) project on inspection operations procedures. Cost-saving was achieved and productivity was improved as non-value-added steps and processes were eliminated.
- Planned, organized, and carried out stakeholder engagement and dialogue sessions. Researched and prepared talking points, insights, and updates for meaningful discussions and outcomes.', 'title': 'Operations Team Lead (Import & Export, Food)', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Singapore', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2005}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'Singapore Food Agency', 'description': 'I joined the Agri-Food and Veterinary Authority of Singapore (reorganised into Singapore Food Agency) as a junior regularoy officer, with a focus on inspection operations of vegetable farms and imported fresh produce. 
Major accomplishments: 
- In-charged and supervised the inspections on vegetable farms and plant nurseries for food safety and pesticide compliance. 
- Carried out desk and field audits, as well as spot checks on horticulture farms for Good Agricultural Practices (GAP) certification scheme. 
- Participated in the risk assessment of crop protection chemicals for registration (pesticide registration). 
Conducted thorough investigations on non-compliances and irregularities discovered during compliance checks, and followed up with appropriate enforcement actions.
- Maintained accurate daily inspection database. 
- Responded to public inquiries, and assisted traders to apply for licenses and trading permits to import food into Singapore, processed and evaluated applications promptly and accurately.', 'title': 'Food Safety and Inspection Regulatory Officer ', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}]
